Serialized Form

  • Package socialmedia

    • Class socialmedia.Account

      class Account extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • description
          String description
          Description chosen by account holder to be displayed with the account.

          Defaults to an empty string

        • handle
          String handle
          Unique handle chosen by the account holder to represent their account
        • identifier
          int identifier
          Identifer for the account

          Takes the value of count+1 when new account created

        • posts
          ArrayList<Post> posts
          ArrayList keeping track of all Post objects created by the account

    • Exception Class socialmedia.AccountIDNotRecognisedException

      class AccountIDNotRecognisedException extends Exception implements Serializable

    • Class socialmedia.Comment

      class Comment extends Post implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • originalPostID
          int originalPostID
          The identifier of the parent post that this comment belongs to

    • Class socialmedia.Endorsement

      class Endorsement extends Post implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • originalPostID
          int originalPostID
          The identifier of the parent post thats being endorsed

    • Exception Class socialmedia.HandleNotRecognisedException

      class HandleNotRecognisedException extends Exception implements Serializable

    • Exception Class socialmedia.IllegalHandleException

      class IllegalHandleException extends Exception implements Serializable

    • Exception Class socialmedia.InvalidHandleException

      class InvalidHandleException extends Exception implements Serializable

    • Exception Class socialmedia.InvalidPostException

      class InvalidPostException extends Exception implements Serializable

    • Exception Class socialmedia.NotActionablePostException

      class NotActionablePostException extends Exception implements Serializable

    • Class socialmedia.Post

      class Post extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • author
          Account author
          The account object representing the author of the post
        • comments
          ArrayList<Comment> comments
          List of comment objects that the post has recieved
        • endorsements
          ArrayList<Endorsement> endorsements
          List of endorsement objects that the post has recieved
        • identifier
          int identifier
          Identifier representing the post

          Takes the value of count+1 when new account created

        • message
          String message
          The message content of the post

    • Exception Class socialmedia.PostIDNotRecognisedException

      class PostIDNotRecognisedException extends Exception implements Serializable

    • Class socialmedia.SocialMedia

      class SocialMedia extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • accounts
          ArrayList<Account> accounts
          List of all active accounts within the system
        • posts
          ArrayList<Post> posts
          List of all posts active within the system (including comments and endorsements)
